about_the_game:
Breaking News:

Local mall shut down after what police are reporting as a gas leak causing a category six earthquake. Investigators reported seeing multiple police vehicles entering the property later that night. Unpredictable weather conditions continue in the aftermath of the incident.


EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM:

ATTENTION ALL RESIDENTS OF []
THIS IS AN URGENT PUBLIC SERVICE ANNOUNCEMENT ISSUED BY THE UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT. UNIDENTIFIED PHENOMENON DETECTED IN THE [] DISTRICT OF []. ALL RESIDENTS OF THE FOLLOWING AREAS WILL BE ORDERED TO REMAIN IN YOUR HOMES: []. CIVIL AUTHORITIES WILL ENFORCE LOCKDOWN UNTIL ANOMALY IS CONTAINED. THIS IS NOT A TEST.


CLASSIFIED:

Task force [] is assigned with investigating and containing the anomaly. [] experts will be sent into the area. Little information is known about the activity occurring inside of the property, and the task force was given no information as to their expected mission. There is a high chance of casualties, psychological damage, trauma, and frightening encounters. Time period for the mission is unknown. The safety of the United States relies on this force, but what secrets could the members be hiding?



This is an indie horror game that includes first person, third person, 3D, 2D, running, hiding, and cinematic content. Warning: This game contains flashing lights, loud noises, and many jumpscares.



keep the door locked

name: Improbability

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: You are all assigned with investigating the backrooms and containing the anomaly. Be aware. There is a high chance of casualties, psychological damage, trauma, and frightening encounters. The safety of the United States relies on you, but what secrets could these members be hiding?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
